mapper.sql: Id, LoginId, LoginPwd, Name, Address, Phone, Mail, Birthday, UserRoleId, UserStateId, RegisterIp, RegisterTime

mapper.update:
update Users
LoginId = #{loginid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LoginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Mail = #{mail,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UserRoleId = #{userroleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UserStateId = #{userstateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RegisterIp = #{registerip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
RegisterTime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Users set LoginId = #{loginid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LoginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Mail = #{mail,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UserRoleId = #{userroleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserStateId = #{userstateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RegisterIp = #{registerip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, RegisterTime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
